Q. Is this project open-source? 
A: Yes. https://github.com/DKillWorld/PurplePlayerPro 

 Q. How can I see Now Playing songs list? 
A: Just swipe down on albumart, as easy as that.

 Q. How can I edit tags? 
A: Just swipe up on albumart.

 Q. After changing app primary color, all songs disappeared. What to do? 
A: This happens when you change from dark actionbar theme to light or vice-versa. However, a quick restart will fix this issue. 

 Q. I found a bug. Where/How to report? 
A: Shoot an email describing the bug and steps to reproduce it.

 Q. Why should I upgrade to Purple Player Pro? 
A: To get bunch of extra features and buy me a cup of coffee. ;)

 Q. I have set sleep timer but its not stopping music playback at selected time. 
A: Sleep timer will not be triggered if you are using the app and 'stopping music playback' will be post-poned until you quit the app.

 Q. I want to help translating app to my local language. How to? 
A: The project is open source. Go ahead : https://github.com/DKillWorld/PurplePlayerPro

 Q. I have some other question outside of FAQ. 
A: Email us briefly describing you question. We will reply ASAP.
